course_title: Colonial Encounters in Spanish-American Literature and Culture

sections.comments: Spanish colonialism in the Americas from the Conquest to the 1820's and the dawn of Independence. Includes coloniality, hybridity, subalternity, and autonomy. Full description: https://fhis.ubc.ca/course-description/span364/

description: Spanish colonialism in the Americas from the Conquest to the 1820's and the dawn of Independence. Includes coloniality, hybridity, subalternity, and autonomy.
